name: A Little Rogue
description:
Collect all the gems by (literally) carving your path through a deadly dungeon.

You have only one HP, so beware of all the sneaky enemies you will encounter!

Tips:
  • A red dot indicates where you enemy will move next.
  • From level 7 onwards, all the enemies are "angry": they attack you if you walk past them!
Controls:
  • Arrow keys: move
  • X (in title screen and message panels): ok
Intro music:

Promenade, from Mussorgsky's Pictures at an Exhibition
